text: Raëlism is a new religion that says that life on Earth was created by aliens. It was started in 1974 by Claude Vorilhon. It is the world's biggest UFO religion.Steven H Propp (2004). Utopia on the 6th Floor: Work, Death, & Taxes – Part 2, Page 450 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:New religious movements Category:Extraterrestrial life
title: Raëlism
